original_text: And his brethren said to him, Shalt thou indeed reign over us? or shalt thou indeed have dominion over us? And they hated him yet the more for his dreams, and for his words.
korean_text: 그의 형들이 그에게 이르되 네가 참으로 우리의 왕이 되겠느냐 참으로 우리를 다스리게 되겠느냐 하고 그의 꿈과 그의 말로 말미암아 그를 더욱 미워하더니

sentences.original_text: And his brethren said to him
Shalt thou indeed reign over us?
or shalt thou indeed have dominion over us?
And they hated him yet the more
